title: Wedding Locations I've Photographed
name: Wedding Locations I've Photographed
description:
A Map by Jessamyn

I'm listing most of the locations I've shot weddings at (although not all) with descriptions when appropriate.  Photos can be seen at &lt;a href=&quot;http://www.jessamynharrisweddings.com&quot;&gt;www.jessamynharrisweddings.com&lt;/a&gt;!

properties.name: Alexander Valley Community Church
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn6650 Hwy 128, Healdsburg, CAA cute, quaint little clapboard church. Small and cozy.

properties.name: Brazilian Room, Tilden Regional Park
properties.description: Posted by JessamynBerkeley, CABeautiful location - used for a lot of weddings. Close to Berkeley but very rural feeling.

properties.name: Civic Center
properties.description: Posted by JessamynFulton and Larkin, San Francisco, CASan Francisco\'s City Hall is amazingly beautiful. I\'ve shot two weddings here (private, couple-only ceremonies) and was married here myself! You can get married on the amazing marble rotunda, and it is so romantic and intimate...

properties.name: Cliff House, San Francisco
properties.description: Posted by JessamynVery romantic, classic SF venue (rebuilt many times after burning down many times). When the fog rolls in, there\'s a nice old timey feel (a little goth, too), and the view of the ocean is lovely. Right nearby are the Sutro Bath ruins, Ocean Beach, and the Camera Obscura - great places for portraits. The restaurant and its terrace are a little small but great for weddings under 100 people, or showers or rehearsal dinners.

properties.name: Griffith Woods
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn1881 Laguna Road, Santa Rosa CA 95401A big, beautiful location - filled with redwoods and nature. Not great for weddings with older or less able bodies - it\'s quite a walk back to the ceremony area. Another highly recommended venue.

properties.name: Hanna Winery
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn9280 hwy 128, healdsburg, caA beautiful location surrounded by vines.

properties.name: Heritage House Inn
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn Little River, CaliforniaA classic, now upgraded, gorgeous location on the cliffs of the Mendocino coast. http://www.heritagehouseinn.com/index.html

properties.name: Interfaith Chapel at the Presidio
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn130 fisher loop, san francisco, caA nice place for a wedding - a little old fashioned for my taste (no flash allowed, and then the priest wants you to go through the wedding "poses" for photos afterwards. Kind of awkward)

properties.name: Jelly's Dance Cafe and Bar
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn 295 terry francois, san francisco, caThis is the first "official" wedding I shot - at an awesome, laid back bar with a beautiful red velvet curtain on the stage. Great view of the Bay, too. It was a very unique, fun wedding!

properties.name: Joaquin Miller Community Center
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn3594 Sanborn Drive, Oakland, CAA nice community center with a beautiful view. Simple but classy!

properties.name: Ladera Oaks
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn3249 Alpine Road, Portola Valley, CA 94028a nice country club in a beautiful part of the South Bay.

properties.name: Lake Sonoma Winery
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn9990 Dry Creek Rd, Geyserville, CAA beautiful location overlooking the Lake Sonoma area. Unfortunately the terrace, which is a lovely place for a ceremony, has these ugly bars all the way around it.

properties.name: Log Cabin in the Presidio
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn1299 Storey Ave, San Francisco, CA A beautiful, rustic space in the heart of the Presidio! I love it!

properties.name: Michel-Schlumberger Winery
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn4155 wine creek rd, healdsburg, caA lovely, members-only winery in the Healdsburg wine valley. The guests of this wedding were given a winemaking tour which was really interesting too.

properties.name: Millenium Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn 580 Geary Street , SF, CAFabulous, delicious, gourmet vegan restaurant. I could eat here all the time! Good for small, simple wedding parties (or showers and rehearsal dinners).

properties.name: Montclair Women’s Cultural Arts Club
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn 1650 Mountain Boulevard, Oakland, CAI thought it was a loooovely place for a wedding, but the bride had lots of problems with the venue coordinator. Beautiful colorful inside venue.

properties.name: Mountain Home Inn
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn 810 Panoramic Highway, Mill Valley, CAA nice, very small hotel/ restaurant with views overlooking the whole Panoramic Highway (mountains mostly). Very pretty and delicious food!

properties.name: Murrietta's Well
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn5565 Tesla Road, Livermore, CAFar in the East Bay, a beautiful little winery venue with a nice barrel room for receptions.

properties.name: Oceansong
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn19100 Coleman Valley Rd, Occidental, CAOne of my favorite locations - underused because it\'s so far out of the way. On a clear day you can see the ocean, yet it\'s inland enough to stay warm on nice days. You get the whole location (a nature preserve) including a barn, meadow, and gardens, for the whole day. A great value and a fantastic location!

properties.name: Outdoor Art Club
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn One West Blithedale, MIll Valley, CA

properties.name: Palmdale Estates
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn159 Washington Blvd Fremont, CA 94539An ok location. Lots of space, pretty inside - but it wasn\'t my favorite for some reason. Nice garden out back, though!

properties.name: Pelican Inn
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn 10 Pacific Way, Sausalito, CA, United StatesGreat for weddings of less than 60 people - this would make a wonderful destination wedding location. A Tudor England style location, complete with romantic (Pacific) fog and rolling hills. The ceremony on the lawn is a little bit public for my taste (with cars driving by) by the inn and location is just gorgeous. Delicious food too!

properties.name: Piedmont Community Hall
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn711 Highland Ave, Piedmont, CAA nice, park location. There were dogs on leashes coming through during the ceremony which is in a beautiful redwood grove. Nice spot!

properties.name: The Old Church
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn1422 Sw 11th Ave, Portland, ORA beautiful old church now used as an event hall, right in downtown Portland. My favorite part was the beautiful blue reception room!

properties.name: Thomas Fogarty Winery
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn 19501 Skyline Boulevard, Woodside, CAWhat a great place for a wedding! Lots of space, a beautiful view for ceremony and reception, gorgeous gardens and vineyards, and on a clear day, a Bay View! I love this place. Highly recommended.

properties.name: Villa Chanticleer
properties.description: Posted by Jessamyn1248 N. Fitch Mountain Road, Healdsburg, CA 95448I\'ve shot here several times - nice, simple venue with pretty gardens. City owned and has kind of a city park/ community center/ VA feel...
